events.message: I recently received my order but want to return it because it doesn’t fit and I would like a refund.
The issue has been classified under Refund as the customer requests returning the product and getting their money back.
Support agent Jane Smith has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the order you mentioned.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product is unused and still in the original packaging as received.
Thanks for the info. We have initiated your refund process, and you should receive the amount back within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the prompt response and for starting the refund. I appreciate your help very much.
The refund case has been resolved and the customer has been notified about the successful initiation of the refund.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
I have received the refund today. Everything is perfect, thank you for the excellent service!
The support case has been formally closed following confirmation of refund receipt and customer satisfaction.
